articles.title: Bitcoin: Analyzing the odds of BTC reaching $64K in May - AMBCrypto News
articles.description: Bitcoin’s price moved up marginally in the last 24 hours, but it might take longer for BTC to turn volatile
articles.content:
• Whales were selling Bitcoin throughout the last week. 
  • Most market indicators suggested that investors might witness a few slow-moving days.
